dt-option.name: searchBuilder.allowed
dt-option.summary: Impose a limit on which data points can be filtered on

type.description: An array of the indexes which can be filtered on.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.allowed` option is `true` meaning that as standard all of the data points can be filtered on.
dt-option.description: This is useful as it allows restrictions to be made on which data points can be filtered on. For tables with a large amount of columns, this prevents having a large set of options within the select element.

example.title: Allowing 3 data pointss to be filtered on
